definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: Now we have a vending machine that we can turn on and off.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们有了一台可以开启和关闭的自动售货机。

sentences.english: This is where a vending machine distributor can really help you.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个自动售货机经销商真能帮助你。

sentences.english: I need the change for the automat.
sentences.chinese: 我想从自动售货机上买东西。

sentences.english: The vending machine is out of order again.
sentences.chinese: 这台自动售货机又坏了。

sentences.english: And the guy that made this, he made a slot machine out of Lego.
sentences.chinese: 做这个的人，他拿乐高做了个投币自动售货机。

sentences.english: Candy-filled vending machines and soda coolers are mostly gone.
sentences.chinese: 糖果和苏打水满自动售货机冷却器大多不见了。

sentences.english: I just lost another 50 cents in this stupid vending machine.
sentences.chinese: 这个破自动售货机又吞了我50美分。

sentences.english: my team is working on a spice vending machine for spices.
sentences.chinese: 我们的团队正在设计一个调味料的自动售货机。

sentences.english: Japan has more than 5.5 million vending machines, note validators and game-playing machines.
sentences.chinese: 日本有550万台自动售货机，验钞机和游戏机。

sentences.english: The vendor is out of order again.
sentences.chinese: 这台自动售货机又坏了。

sentences.english: Use this machine when the bar is closed.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧要是关了用自动售货机买。

sentences.english: Cool vending machine created to promote Smart cars in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 酷自动售货机在日本，为推动智能车机。

sentences.english: Air - Serv Group LLC Manufacturer of air pump and personal product vending machines.
sentences.chinese: 空气泵和个人的产品制造商自动售货机。

sentences.english: In this article we will build the most basic vending machine.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，我们将构建最基本的自动售货机。

sentences.english: I walked directly to the big old red-and-white dispenser.
sentences.chinese: 我径直走向那台红白相间的巨大的老自动售货机。

definition: kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
counter for the display of goods/(Tw) container (for freight transport)
